TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit NativeActivityMetadata extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 代表参数、子活动、变量和委托的集合，通过一个已配置的 引入执行环境。

span.span: Represents the set of arguments, child activities, variables, and delegates that a configured introduces to the execution environment.

summary.span: 将指定的活动添加到子活动的元数据列表中。

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata’s list of child activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 添加的活动是可由父活动直接安排的子活动。An activity added using is a child activity that the parent activity can schedule directly. 这些活动将由活动的使用者提供。These activities are to be provided by the consumer of the activity. 活动的 集合便属于这种情况。An example of this is the collection of a activity. 这些活动（及它们使用 或 添加的任何活动）有权访问通过 添加的变量。These activities (and any activities they add using or ) have access to variables added through .

summary.span: 将指定的扩展提供程序添加到活动的默认扩展提供程序的集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified extension provider to the collection of default extension providers for the activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主机未提供 `T` 类型的扩展，则系统会对此扩展提供程序进行计算以提供一个此类型的扩展。If the host does not provide an extension of type `T`, then this extension provider is evaluated to provide one.

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata’s list of implementation activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 添加的活动是可由父活动直接安排的子活动。An activity added using is a child activity that the parent activity can schedule directly. 这些活动是该活动的实现细节。These activities are implementation details of the activity. 这些活动（及它们使用 或 添加的任何活动）有权访问该活动的参数以及通过 添加的变量。These activities (and any activities they add using or ) have access to this activity’s arguments as well as variables added through .

span.span: Adds the specified activity to the metadata’s list of imported child activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导入的子活动是父活动不能直接安排的子活动。An imported child activity is a child activity that the parent activity does not schedule directly. 相反，之后父活动可以使用此活动配置一些其他子活动。Rather, then parent uses this activity to configure some other child activity.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddVariable (System.Activities.Variable variable);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddVariable(class System.Activities.Variable variable) cil managed
public: void AddVariable(System::Activities::Variable ^ variable);

span.span: The variable to add.

summary.span: 将指定的变量添加到变量的元数据集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified variable to the metadata’s collection of variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法添加的变量被视为活动的可公开配置图面的一部分，也就是说，它们将由活动的使用者提供。Variables added using this method are considered part of the activity’s publicly configurable surface, that is, they are to be provided by the consumer of the activity. 活动的实现无法访问使用此方法添加的变量。An activity’s implementation cannot access variables added using this method. 通过 或 添加的活动（及它们的任何未实现子活动）可以访问使用此方法添加的变量。Activities added through or (and any of their non-implementation child activities) can access variables added using this method.

.method public hidebysig instance void AddVariable(class System.Activities.Variable variable, object origin) cil managed

The origin of the variable.
